creator: arun.mathur@lmco.com
text:
When running ant install as well as the list command, I get a 401 error. I ran
ant through debug, and verified that ant is receiving the proper username and
password combination when making the request to the manager servlet.   On the
other hand, I am able to authenticate and run the list command via the web
browser without any problems.  

Let me know if there's any more information I can provide.

Regards,
Arun

what ant install? what list command? I am confused

is this a bug in an ant built in task that is being shown in some build file. In
which case we need at least: the build file, the URL, and some understanding of
what is happening. 

is this some build file from a third party? if so, who?
creator: stevel@apache.org
jan@materne.de
text:
The term "401 error" sounds as a web-error-message to me.
But Ant is a stand alone tool.
... ok, some use that inside a webcontainer, but that´s not the default meaning.

This bug report can be closed. The 401 error is occuring when I run the command
line ant tool on a given build.xml file.  I'm a bit new to the technology, so I
apologize for the confusion.

Thanks,
Arun
creator: arun.mathur@lmco.com

text:
You´re welcome - espacially if you close your own bugs :-)

If you have difficulties with that buildfile, try to focus on the problem and 
ask on the user mailing list. Provide a (small) code snippet and the output 
were the error occurs.
creator: jan@materne.de
